message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Take this 10% and let's move on!
Alice, that's not very generous. Let's be fair, I'm proposing a 70/30 split.
Okay, Bob, let's compromise.  I'll take a 60/40 split this time.  What do you say?
Alice, let's be realistic. We both know I'm about to propose 50/50, so why don't we save time and go with 60/40 my way?
